title: Sample Application Form
description: A demonstration of conditional wizard forms

fields.question: What is your full name?
fields.name: full_name
fields.hint: Enter your full name as it appears on official documents

fields.question: Are you over 18 years old?
fields.name: age_eligible
fields.hint: You must be 18 or over to continue

steps.title: Application Not Available
steps.description: Unfortunately, you are not eligible to apply at this time

fields.question: You must be 18 or over to use this service
fields.name: eligibility_info
fields.hint: Please return when you are 18 years old. For more information, contact our support team.

steps.title: Application Type
steps.description: What type of application are you making?

fields.question: Select the type of application
fields.name: application_type
fields.hint: Choose the option that best describes your application

fields.question: Explain why this application is urgent
fields.name: urgency_reason
fields.hint: Provide specific details about why immediate processing is needed

fields.question: Are you in immediate danger or need emergency assistance?
fields.name: emergency_situation
fields.hint: Select Yes if you need immediate help or are in danger

fields.question: Emergency contact information and next steps
fields.name: emergency_info
fields.hint: Call 999 if you are in immediate danger. For urgent assistance, call our emergency helpline: 0800 123 456. Please describe your situation and location.

fields.question: What type of business is this?
fields.name: business_type

fields.question: What institution are you studying at?
fields.name: institution_name

fields.question: What is your course of study?
fields.name: course_name

fields.question: What year of study are you in?
fields.name: study_year

fields.question: Why are you making this application?
fields.name: application_reason
fields.hint: Explain your reasons in detail (maximum 500 words)

fields.question: What is your email address?
fields.name: email_address
fields.hint: We'll use this to send you updates about your application

fields.question: How would you prefer us to contact you?
fields.name: contact_preference
fields.hint: We'll use your preferred method for important updates

steps.title: Confirm Your Application
steps.description: Please review and confirm your details

fields.question: I confirm that the information I have provided is accurate and complete
fields.name: confirmation_declaration
fields.hint: You must agree to this declaration to submit your application

fields.question: Would you like to receive updates about similar services?
fields.name: marketing_consent
fields.hint: We'll only send relevant information and you can opt out at any time
